entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9609] It is expected that ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation with a value of -424,000,000 reported in the network role http://www.ubs.com/role/HedgeAccountingDetail5 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationMember and a reported value of 4,947,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.ubs.com/role/ConsolidatedStatementOfChangesInEquity, http://www.ubs.com/role/ConsolidatedStatementOfChangesInEquityParenthetical. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation fact are:
Period : 2023-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation : -6 Decimals of Equity : -6 Rule version: 26.0.9 - ubs-20241231.htm 131829

property.name: label
property.value: Reserve Of Exchange Differences On Translation
